channel.title: How do u take hamachi off?
channel.description:
hi i have hamachi running one of my servers right now, how do i make it that i have a no-ip? i have my no-ip running with my server name but ppl cannot log onto it like that. Do i need to insert something in my client or something. plz help me.
tyvm

item.title: How do u take hamachi off?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

to remove hamachi you need to farword port and point the no ip to ur ip

or if you want hamachi but a no-ip also

(un confirmed but 99% sure it works: use hamachi and convert your hamachi IP into a no ip)

Read full topic
item.source: How do u take hamachi off?
